description: Try our easy to follow Aussie Beef Sausages with Onion Relish recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sausage dishes,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Beef,BBQ,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Peanut free
name: Aussie Beef Sausages with Onion Relish Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red chilli, deseeded and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frying pan over a high heat. Add onion and capsicum and cook, stirring occassionally, for 10 minutes or until golden brown and softened. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Add chilli, garlic, ginger and 100ml of red wine vinegar to the frying pan and bring to the boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Return onion mixture to pan with remaining vinegar, brown sugar and salt. Cook for 5 minutes or until thickened.
Meanwhile, preheat a BBQ hotplate on medium. Add sausages and cook, turning regularly, for 10-15 minutes or until cooked through.
Split bread rolls and open out flat. Fill each with a sausage and top with onion relish and some rocket leaves.
